Various snippets that are not my own / licensed differently:

---

- slide_fixes.css
was created by mess_2021 on the obsidian forum:
https://forum.obsidian.md/t/css-to-fix-the-obsidian-presentation-slide/34934

---

- vault_title.css
The seed was given to me by 'sailKite' on the obsidian discord server:
https://github.com/sailKiteV

It was originally (before my modifications) as followed:
```
.workspace-ribbon.mod-left + .mod-left-split .workspace-tabs.mod-top-left-space .workspace-tab-header-spacer {
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;

    &::after {
        content: "CSS_Playground"; /* replace with your vault name or whatever */
    }
}
```

and lives / originally lived at: https://discord.com/channels/686053708261228577/694233507500916796/1176263259683295414
